item.title: ‘Everyone was grieving’: Did my wife’s brothers cheat her out of her inheritance? There’s a condo and $550K at stake.
item.description: “When my wife’s mom passed away, the eldest brother took on the role as executor.”

item.title: Feeling Powerball fever as the jackpot hits $1 billion? This former lottery addict who lost around $1 million has a warning for you.
item.description: Adam Osmond gambled away a fortune on lottery games, but he eventually sought help.

item.title: I just spent $4,400 as the best man at a wedding. It’s not just bridesmaids who pay a fortune.
item.description: Guilt over how good a friend I am is colliding with the financial reality that this wedding will cost me thousands of dollars.

item.title: This healthcare benefit provides a triple tax advantage — but many employees don’t use it
item.description: Health Savings Accounts combine federal tax-deductible contributions with tax-free growth and tax-free medical withdrawals.

item.title: What’s next in the legal fight between Fed governor Lisa Cook and President Trump
item.description: Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook and the Trump administration had their day in court Friday — but all parties will have to wait longer for a ruling ...
